content: Hello guys, I am selling Amazon accounts from US UK EU with loaded Gift CardBalance on these cards are from $300-$500Ready to purchase in amazon siteAmazon accounts with loaded $300 Gift Card Price: $100 per accountAmazon accounts with loaded $500 Gift Card Price: $150 per accountThese gift cards are safe to use and get them from winning contentsI can provide 5 accounts dailyPayment method: Skrill bitcoin UsdtRefund policy: I provide 2 weeks replacement if anything happens to the accountContacts: Telegram: https://t.me/MatthewNorman1 @MatthewNorman1
